You have entered in to the Honda final draw successfully.
Combine Brake System | Tubeless Tires
Honda motorcycles–Honda bicycles records most sales in Sri Lanka and the world
• Combi Brake System–bicycle can stop within very low distance safely.\n • Tubeless Tires–when tire puncture occurs while riding, tire has special mechanism and wont to leak air quickly
Automatic Headlamp On (AHO )–Automatic main lamps (On lamps) gives additional safety while riding

•Telescopic Front Suspension (Only in Grazia scooter) –it suits for all kind of roads.\n •Wider Seat– it gives comfortable riding.\n •Spacious 18L Under seat Storage–can carry cargo easily and comfortably.
• HET Engine–Honda eco HET engine give maximum mileage and saves petrol.\n • Eco Speed Indicator–Honda Scooter gives maximum mileage for unit fuel and give indications for your fuel consumption.

• Maintenance Free Battery (MF Battery)- less maintenance cost for battery.\n • Viscous Air Filter- Air filter can use up to 16000Km without exchange.\n • Service intervals in Every 4,000 km - Maintenance cost for scooter is low because maintenance should be done after every 4000Km.
